title: Chromecast volume control shown 3-4 times in volumes shortcuts
content:
3-4 Chromecast volume setting are shown in my volume control even when they are not in use. Like why do I have a control for YouTube on Salon and Dazn on Salon (name of my Chromecast) 

I also need to scroll down just to change my notification volumes. I wouldn't care much if the Chromecast volume were at the bottom...
